info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 6:27PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Madison and southeastern Beaverhead Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 627 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles north of Kilgore, or 20 miles west of Henrys Lake, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Madison and southeastern Beaverhead Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
